> [styromaniac](#comment_220_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): Why don't you post those on the clearnet instead of here? A boycott? That makes no sense unless you're a pedophile. Wording is confusing. I assume this is supposed to turn into legal sensationalist bait. So, again, why here? Magnet URIs work on the clearnet and have absolutely nothing to do with ZeroNet, FBI agent.

There is no law, no boundaries, unlimited freedom!
I like this!
